podcasts.title: Following the Money: Inside Kenya's Budget
podcasts.description: We break down the national budget in plain language, explaining where your tax money actually goes and why it matters to you.

podcasts.title: Youth Voices: The Next Generation Speaks
podcasts.description: Young Kenyans from across the country share their experiences with government services and what change means to them.

podcasts.title: The Healthcare Crisis No One Talks About
podcasts.description: A deep dive into rural healthcare challenges, featuring interviews with doctors, patients, and administrators.

podcasts.title: Education Emergency: What's Going Wrong?
podcasts.description: Teachers, parents, and students discuss the challenges facing our education system and potential solutions.

podcasts.title: Infrastructure: Building Dreams or Pipelines?
podcasts.description: Analyzing major infrastructure projects and their impact on communities and the environment.

podcasts.title: Agriculture: Feeding the Nation
podcasts.description: Farmers share their stories about subsidies, climate change, and finding markets for their produce.
